channel.title: Blog on Explore
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Explore

item.title: New England Summer 2018
item.description: Vermont & New Hampshire Trip Day 1 June 29 Landed at Newark Airport Ate Roti falafel for lunch Started driving toward New Haven Dinner at Frank Pepe Pizza Started driving towards Barnet, VT at around 8.00 pm Reached the rented house at 1.30 am. It was an adventure to locate the house late at night with no cell phone reception. The house was impressive, location was great and it was located in the woods.

item.title: Europe Summer 2017
item.description: Europe Summer 2017 Trip Countries visited Switzerland, Italy, Montenegro, Greece, Croatia Day 1 As hurricane harvey was approaching US the trip was in serious doubt. But luckily the planes left before the hurricane made landfall. Next day landed in Zurich Took the train from Zurich to Bern, Bern to Interlaken, Interlaken to Grindelwald Reached [Grindlewald hotel] around 4 pm Had pizza for greasy pizza for dinner, then had a relaxing evening while a band played American country music Day 2 Took the gondola up to First Cliff Walk, and enjoyed some amazing views of the Alps Then hiked to a nearby lake Bachalpsee and took some more pictures of the peaks in reflecting water.
